original: 啟稟大人，屬下已遣人對<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>打草驚蛇計謀遭遇了意料之外的問題，不慎失敗了！(<color=#bceea7>打草驚蛇 失敗</color>)
text: Master Qi, his subordinates have encountered unexpected problems with the <color=#bceea7>$city1</color> plot to start a grass and startling snakes, and accidentally failed! (<color=#bceea7>「Lure out」 failed</color>)
